EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register! Join Us for an AeroNav Webinar June 18 at 8 p.m. EDT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
<[[http://www.socialflight.com/#reg]]>WEBINAR - LAST CHANCE TO REGISTER!Installing and Flying AeroNav 800/900/910 Navigators from BendixKing
<[[http://www.socialflight.com/#reg]]>
Just one day until the webinar- Installing and Flying AeroNav 800/900/910 Navigators from BendixKing. Join Steven Pearce, BendixKing Product Manager and Jeff Simon, SocialFlight President, A&P/IA for a discussion on how the AeroNav products fit into your next panel upgrade, as well as the features and techniques to streamline your flying.
Webinar: Installing and Flying AeroNav 800/900/910 Navigators from BendixKing Date: Tuesday, June 18th Time: 8 p.m. EDT
Topics Include:
- Installation Considerations and Tips - BendixKing Strategies for The Future Panel & Partnerships - Hybrid Touch & Buttons - Intuitive Navigation - Backup Attitude with Synthetic Vision - Comparisons and Demo
Your webinar registration includes free access to information on over 10,000 aviation events, destinations, airport restaurants, contests and more listed on SocialFlight.com and the SocialFlight mobile app.
REGISTER HERE <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/719253627236775179]]>
